mapper.insert: insert into ZZ_CHAT_LOG( id, user_id, user_name, user_ip, url, method, parameters, return_result, success_flg, error_inf, time ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameters,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{successFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate )
